question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Directory Creation Recursion] Line 177 uses create_dir_all() - can extremely deep paths cause stack overflow? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [No Checksum Verification] Written files have no checksums - can silent corruption go undetected? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: get_raw_file()] [No Integrity Check on Read] Read files aren't validated for integrity - can corrupted files crash the indexer? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Transaction Ordering Not Verified] Chunks iterate without verifying sequential transaction versions - can reordered transactions corrupt the store? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Async Cancellation Safety] If upload_transaction_batch() is cancelled mid-execution, are partial writes cleaned up? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: update_file_store_metadata_internal()] [Async Race on Self Mutation] Mutable self with async operations - can await points allow concurrent access? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [FILE_ENTRY_TRANSACTION_COUNT Assumption] Code assumes FILE_ENTRY_TRANSACTION_COUNT=1000 - if this constant changes, are all validations still correct? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Starting Version Calculation] Line 169 uses first().unwrap() on chunks - can empty chunks after splitting cause panics? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: update_file_store_metadata_with_timeout()] [Empty File Store Detection] Line 109 checks for NotFound to detect empty store - can partially initialized stores bypass this? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [No Transaction Boundary] Multiple concurrent uploads can interleave file writes - does this break transaction atomicity guarantees? (Critical)
[File: aptos-labs/aptos-core] [Function: verify_storage_bucket_existence()] [No Lock on Path] No filesystem lock acquired on path - can concurrent processes using same path cause corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Metadata-Files Consistency] Metadata updated after files written - can crash between these leave metadata stale? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: get_raw_file()] [File System Case Sensitivity] On case-insensitive filesystems, can version collisions occur if FileEntry::build_key() generates colliding names? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Hardlink/Junction Attack] Can an attacker create hardlinks or junctions to make the same file appear at multiple versions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Version Arithmetic Overflow] Adding batch_size to start_version at lines 211, 217, 221 - is overflow checking needed for extreme values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: get_file_store_metadata()] [Version Field Overflow] If metadata.version approaches u64::MAX, can subsequent increments overflow causing version reset? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: new()] [Format Enum Extension] If StorageFormat enum gains new variants, will old stored data with unknown formats cause panics? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-utils/src/file_store_operator/local.rs] [Function: upload_transaction_batch()] [Parent Unwrap Panic] Line 174 unwraps parent() assuming it exists - can root-level paths or Windows drive letters cause panics? (Medium)
